TADS 3 Library: command reports This module defines the "command report" classes, which the command execution engine uses to keep track of the status of a command.

Summary of Global Functions  

withCommandTranscript

Global Functions  

withCommandTranscript (transcriptClass, func)

report.t[1907]

Invoke a callback function using a transcript of the given class. Returns the return value of the callback function.
